sourcesContent:
import React from "react"
import { MdAccountCircle, MdEmail } from "react-icons/md"
import { Menu, MenuButton, MenuList, MenuItem, MenuDivider, Button, ButtonGroup, Flex} from "@chakra-ui/react"

function Header(props) {
    return (
        <Flex style={{ display: "grid", justifySelf: "end" }}>
            <ButtonGroup justifyContent="right">
                <Button leftIcon={<MdEmail />} size="sm">Message</Button>
                {props.userId?
                <Menu>
                    <MenuButton
                        px={4}
                        py={2}
                        transition='all 0.2s'
                        borderRadius='md'
                        borderWidth='1px'
                        _hover={{ bg: 'gray.400' }}
                        _expanded={{ bg: 'blue.400' }}
                        _focus={{ boxShadow: 'outline' }}
                    >
                    {props.userId} <MdAccountCircle />
                    </MenuButton>
                    <MenuList>
                    <MenuItem>New File</MenuItem>
                    <MenuItem>New Window</MenuItem>
                    <MenuDivider />
                    <MenuItem>Open...</MenuItem>
                    <MenuItem>Save File</MenuItem>
                    </MenuList>
                </Menu>
                :
                // <Button leftIcon={<MdAccountCircle />} size="sm">Login</Button>
                (null)}
                
            </ButtonGroup>
        </Flex>

    )
}

export default Header
